website_summaries.verdict: With its intuitive fit, this back plate is a favorite that encourages athletes to hit the field.
pros: With its unique curved design, this plate fits many and also protects well
Fits well with most shoulder pads
We love the reviews associated with peace of mind with this protective pad

customer_reviews.title: Youth size it REALLY small.
customer_reviews.text: This is built very well and extremely solid a really good backplate but make sure you get the adult size if your kid is any older than like 7 years old or so because the youth size is really small on my eight year old and he is pretty skinny. I give three stars because there was nothing stating it was that small.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: It got here fast. It fits perfect. My son is 6’2 250lbs and he’s only 14 i was hoping that when it got here it would fit him because he’s not a normal youth size. It was perfect. Battle never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Venegas

customer_reviews.title: Beast on the field!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old grandson that is 5’ tall & 134 lbs. The adult size fits well & he loves it. The back plate is surprisingly light & comfortable. My only complaint is the attachment method. I ended up following advise of other reviewers & attaching it with zip ties. This worked. All his teammates & coaches loved the picture, especially since he is a real beast on the field!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Recieved product in a timely manner and it was as expected. It looked great and fit right on to my sons football pads with ease. Just screw it on and go. The quality also looked and felt great. I'd buy this product again and would also recommend it to other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: 7babez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Screws break off easily. Had to zip tie both of my sons.
customer_reviews.author: T M

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son he's- 155lbs- 5'11" plays DE,OLB,RB. the most comfortable plate he's worn so far. The curved shape makes a a BIG difference.
customer_reviews.author: Y.P.

customer_reviews.title: Protection for the Lower Back, and Spine!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, and protection for the lower back and spine area. My son is 5'3" weighing in at 109 lbs. We went with the adult size due to the Youth Size was too small in measurement. As you can see from the picture, it covers his entire lower back area, without restricting his motion. I recommend putting a small drop of Blue Loctite to secure the fastener threads, to the shoulder pads, so that it will not loosen up during the game.
customer_reviews.author: 1bighawaiian

customer_reviews.title: the black one works just fine it helps me breathe a little easier when my ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for having this back plate, I looked everywhere for it and could not find it. Although, my Grandson really wanted a white one, the black one works just fine it helps me breathe a little easier when my Grand Son is out there playing on the field. Much Thanks Mrs. Linda Windham
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just what my son was looking for, he's please with the item, I think a little pricey but, as long as he's happy with it and it helps to protect, it's all good. Was easy to install, well padded.
customer_reviews.author: mom of boys

customer_reviews.title: Amazing overall but some Cons.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought it i tried to fit it through the holes in my shoulder pads but the holes didn't line up so I Just had to make my own but overall it is one of the best back played I owned and it's comfortable. Can't wait to played this season with this back plate on.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The brace was very nice for my grandson to protect his lower back. Was not sure how to put this onto his shoulder pads until someone else from the team told me I had to take out the bolts on the back and put the new ones in and it went on very easy.

product_meta.title: Battle Sports Football Back Plate Tail Pad, Gold, Adult
product_meta.description:
Battle Back Bone Back Plate
We know football protection and performance like it's our job. Because it is. The Battle Back Plate is designed to deliver maximum protection and comfort to players of all ages, and the football back shield is an effective and reliable protector for the lower back, kidneys and spine.

Curved Back Protector
The Battle Back Plate absorbs impact to your back region, acting as a buffer against the hardest hits on the football field. The interior backing of the back plate is a high impact foam. Compared to flat backplates, the unique design of Battle's curved back shield ensures maximum energy and impact disbursement, as well as being much more comfortable to wear with your football pads.

Easy Fitting
The sleek and lightweight rear shield pads are available in Youth and Adult sizes to ensure the perfect fit, and in a range of bold and vibrant colors. The back protector is designed with strong attachment straps to keep the backplate close to your back - floppy back plates won't protect you from painful blind side hits. Hardware is supplied, and the back protector plate can be hand washed as required.

Battle - The Highest Standard of Sports Safety
Here at Battle, we know the feeling well. Former athletes and now passionate weekend warriors, we know all too well the agony that sports injuries can bring. By blending cutting-edge science with a keen understanding of the athlete, we produce some of the finest sports safety equipment anywhere, and will continue to push the envelope to make sports safer in the days to come.
feature_bullets: Curved design for max energy disbursement
Adult size fits individuals 5'4"+ and approximately 100+ lbs.
